attributes.action: Abolish the requirement for national curriculum to be taught by nursery schools and child minders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nursery schools and child minders are regulated by ofsted to the extent that they have to include constructive learning time each day.

I went to play group to learn to socialise.  School is for discipline and learning.  Play group is for play.

As a parent I am appalled at the complete lack of choice avalable to me when looking for day care for my child.

I do not beleive there is any need for children to be formally taught until school age.
